GK19gp12-22u:835: anusmṛtya vismṛta-sarvendriya-kṛtyaḥ sa-bāṣpa-kaṇṭhaḥ snigdhakaṇṭhas tasyāṃ sabhāyāṃ muhūrta-dvayaṃ mūrta-bhāvam evāsasāda |
GK19gp12-22u:837: tadīya-sāntva-vidhaye sāvadhānā nānā-vidha-vidhānam ācarantaḥ sarva eva
GK19gp12-22u:839: [22] tat-tad-vidhānasya cākiñcit-karatāyām aviratāyāṃ madhukaṇṭha eva tān
GK19gp12-22u:844: rajanī-mukham anu jananī-lālanam iti kalitaṃ jita-kalinā ||dhru||
GK19gp12-22u:850: priya-sakha-saṅgatim anu sevy-anugatim anu ca mudām aticayanam
GK19gp12-22u:855: madhura-rāga-nīrandhraṃ karṇa-randhraṃ praviśad eva taṃ mūrcchām ṛcchantam api jāgarayāmāsa, nāma-dheyam iva nidrā-labdha-cid-rāhityam |
GK19gp12-22u:858: so' yaṃ gopāla-bhūpāla tanayas tava nirdayaḥ |
GK19gp12-22u:859: mugdhaṃ ca mad-vidhaṃ mugdhaṃ karoti svaira-līlayā ||JGc_1,14.14||
GK19gp12-22u:861: [25] tad evaṃ vṛtte nivṛtte sarvatra ca vraja-jane gṛha-vartmānuvṛtte
GK19gp12-22u:862: nityavad eva vraja-mahendra-tanūjas tau sūta-rāja-tanūjau saṅgata eva nināya |
GK19gp12-22u:863: nītvā ca tayor ātmanā tṛtīyaḥ san prasaṅgataḥ pracchannatayā papraccha-kathayataṃ, katham etāvān kasmān mūrcchāveśaḥ kleśa iva
GK19gp12-22u:865: [26] ubhau tu sa-gadgadaṃ jagadatuḥ-kiṃ brūvahe, bhavanta iva sarvam
GK19gp12-22u:867: [27] kṛṣṇaś ca sa-tṛṣṇam uvāca-jānīma eva kevalaṃ na, kintu tadānīṃ svayam
GK19gp12-22u:868: api nitarām ācarāmas, tathāpi tad varṇanam ākarṇayitum icchāmaḥ |
GK19gp12-22u:871: svayam api yat puru racitaṃ tad yadi hṛdayaṃ tadā sadā śrāvyam |
GK19gp12-22u:872: kāvyaṃ nija-sacitaṃ yat tad idaṃ yuvakāṃ parasparaṃ śṛṇuthaḥ
GK19gp12-22u:875: bimboṣṭhī-goṣṭhī-madhyam adhyāsya vyasyatām eṣā paṭīyasī rasa-paripāṭī |
GK19gp12-22u:877: yad antar yasya sarvaṃ tat tasya jānāty abhīpsitaḥ |
GK19gp12-22u:878: sa eva ced vasaty antas taṃ tu jānīta kaḥ paraḥ ||JGc_1,14.16|| [anuṣṭubh]
GK19gp12-22u:879: [30] kṛṣṇaś ca sānandam uvāca-tad adya naktam evānavadyā seyaṃ vidyā nivedyatām iti bāhu-yugaṃ gṛhītvā sakhi-goṣṭhīm anu tāv amū nītvā
GK19gp12-22u:886: [1] atha goloka-yuva-rājaḥ sakhibhiḥ saha rājamānaḥ, sāyaṃ pratyavasāya,
GK19gp12-22u:889: anujñāpya, tad anyān prasthāpya, mahāntaḥ-puraṃ prāpya, prasū-nideśam
GK19gp12-22u:894: [2] akasmād āgate ca tasmin sasmita-krīḍā-narma-juṣām amūṣāṃ
GK19gp12-22u:895: sambhrama-bhrama-vismaya-smaya-trapā-patrapādarādara-harṣa-tarṣādayas te bhāvā yugapad eva samutpannāś citrīyamāṇatāṃ citrāyamāṇatām apy āceruḥ |
GK19gp12-22u:897: akasmād āyāntaṃ harim anubhavantī kila hriyā daśām akṣṇor nānā-drutam apidadhe sā nata-mukhī
GK19gp12-22u:898: mudā smerā bhugnā vikasitavatī kuñcitavatī sa-bāṣpā stabdhābhābhavad iti samaṃ yā na ghaṭate
GK19gp12-22u:901: taraṇena tam ativistīrṇaṃ maṇi-kīrṇam alindam āstīrṇaṃ cakre |
GK19gp12-22u:902: āstīrṇasya ca tasya pratīcī-pracita-sulalita-tulikāyāṃ prācī-mukhatayā svayaṃ niviśamānaḥ śubhratārāma-cāmarādi-karābhiḥ kiṅkarībhiḥ sevyamānaḥ śrī-rādhāyā bahir api virājamāna-prāṇaḥ pāṇinā tām ādāya
GK19gp12-22u:909: tasthatuḥ, yayo rāga-tālādi-sāhāyakāḥ sakhāya eva kecana sacante sma |
GK19gp12-22u:910: [6] yau khalu dvayor api tayoḥ savayasām āvalyor ardha-maṇisara-vallyor
GK19gp12-22u:915: [7] tataś ca prahasya nava-ghana-śyāmenādi-śyamānatayā sāvadhānatāṃ dadhānāv ānandād ubhāv eva saṃhitāñjali-karau nāndī-karau babhūvatuḥ |
GK19gp12-22u:917: imau gaurī-śyāmau manasi viparītau bahir api sphurat tat-tad-vastrāv iti budha-janair niścitam idam |
GK19gp12-22u:919: dadhan mūrti-bhāvaṃ pṛthag apṛthag apy āvirudabhūt ||JGc_1,15.2||
GK19gp12-22u:922: śrīr āsāṃ na tulāṃ bibharti nitarām ity uddhavaḥ kīrtayan yāsām aṅghri-rajo nanāma hariṇā yaḥ svena tulyo mataḥ |
GK19gp12-22u:930: so' yaṃ buddhiṃ naḥ samiddhāṃ karotu ||JGc_1,15.4|| [śāliṇī]
GK19gp12-22u:931: iti parasparaṃ sa-vailakṣya-smitam īkṣitvā sthitayos tayoḥ snigdhakaṇṭha eva sotkaṇṭham uvāca-
GK19gp12-22u:933: varṇanīyeti nirṇaye' py ativistīrṇatā-saṅkocanāya kiñcid eva sūcayiṣyāmaḥ
GK19gp12-22u:938: janmārabhya harer vraja-sthalam abhūd viśva-rddhi-yuktaṃ punar lakṣmīṇāṃ ramaṇāspadaṃ ca tad-adhiṣṭhānād viśiṣyājani |
GK19gp12-22u:939: rādhā yāsu lalāsa pūrṇa-śaśabhṛn-mūrtīva tārāsu sā kāntiḥ kintv iha citra-bhāva-valitā yā kṛṣṇa-pakṣādhikā ||JGc_1,15.5||
GK19gp12-22u:941: [14] bṛhad-gautamīye' py eṣā sarvato labdha-viśeṣā prastūyate-
GK19gp12-22u:944: [15] alaṃ-lakṣmīṇām etad-ādīnāṃ lakṣmīṇāṃ janma ca śrīmat-parjanyam
GK19gp12-22u:946: mātula-gotrāṇāṃ ye khalv āmuṣyāyaṇa-kulatā-nirbandhinaḥ sambandhinas tebhya eveti māgadhānām anusandhānaṃ sa-yatnī-bhūya yajña-patnīs
GK19gp12-22u:947: tyaktavatas tasya tathāvyakta-maryādatānyathā na paryāptatām āpadyate |
GK19gp12-22u:948: [16] tad evaṃ sthiteṣu ca śrī-rādhikāyās tu sarvato' py āḍhya-kulīnāś
GK19gp12-22u:951: satyaṃ bahu-suta-ratnā- karatāṃ na prāpa gopa-dugdhābdhiḥ |
GK19gp12-22u:955: [19] janmānantaraṃ tasyāḥ san-mādhurī ceyaṃ kṛtāvalokena lokena kīdṛg iti pṛcchataḥ prati
GK19gp12-22u:956: navendur mūrtir vā kanaka-kamalaṃ vaktram athavā cakorau netre vā visarad-amṛtaṃ dṛṣṭir athavā |
GK19gp12-22u:957: apītthaṃ rādhāyāṃ yadi jita-tulāyāṃ na valate vikalpaḥ kiṃ tarhi prasajatitarāṃ tat-tad-upamā ||JGc_1,15.7|| [śikhariṇī]
GK19gp12-22u:958: [20] āstāṃ tāvad asau vraja-lakṣmīṇāṃ parama-lakṣmīr akhilāś ca tās tathā varṇyante |
GK19gp12-22u:960: harim anu vindati śaśval lakṣmīr iti yā tu sarvataḥ khyātā |
GK19gp12-22u:961: tām api kila gopāyituṃ gopī-saṃjñā jayanti tā lakṣmyaḥ ||JGc_1,15.8||
GK19gp12-22u:965: yathā candramasaḥ puṣṭis tathā tasya rucām api ||JGc_1,15.9|| [anuṣṭubh]
GK19gp12-22u:966: [21] tatra kaumāra-madhyam adhyāsīnāyāṃ śrī-rādhikāyāṃ tadānītanānāṃ keṣāñcin nārī-janānām utprekṣā yathā-paśya paśya,
GK19gp12-22u:971: [22] tad evam īdṛg-vayasi paryavasite tadādīnāṃ tāsāṃ saundarya-sārasya
GK19gp12-22u:972: pracāraḥ sarvata eva prasarpan mātara-pitarādibhir nāpasarpayitum īśāñcakre cintayāmāse ca, na jānīmahe, durjanaḥ kaṃsaḥ kiṃ samprati sampratipatsyate iti |
GK19gp12-22u:973: [23] atha pratyaham eva pratyekam antaḥ paraspara-militāḥ santaś ca te
GK19gp12-22u:974: sarve vicāritavantaḥ, sāmpratam eva pātrasātkartum etāḥ sāmprataṃ |
GK19gp12-22u:975: tatrāpy āsāṃ śrīman-nanda-nandanād avaras tu na varatām arhati |
GK19gp12-22u:978: kanyā dhanyatamā ramām api jitāṃ kurvanty amūr nandajaḥ svasmād ūnadaśāṃ ramā-ramaṇam apy āsādayan dṛśyate |
GK19gp12-22u:979: tasmāt tulyatayā sa eva varatām arhaty amūṣāṃ tadapy āstāṃ dhāma-suhṛt-priyātma-tanaya-prāṇā hi nas tatkṛte ||JGc_1,15.11||
GK19gp12-22u:981: [24] atha, yadyapy adhunā yajña-sūtram alabdhavatas tasya na vivāhāvasaraḥ
GK19gp12-22u:982: sambhavati, tathāpi sajjana-samājñām ācārya bhāṣā-bandhaś ca sandhātavya iti |
GK19gp12-22u:983: [25] tad etad vicārya sthitānāṃ teṣāṃ niścayāvadhāraṇa-pūrvakaṃ tan nivāraṇaṃ prati pūrvavad eva vasudeva-mantraṇayā
GK19gp12-22u:984: yantrita-vicāra-vargatayāpi gargaḥ sarva-darśitayā tad idaṃ parāmamarśa-
GK19gp12-22u:986: tal-līlā-śakti-prayutānām asmākaṃ ca tatra pratyag-vadācaraṇe' pi nāradavan na pratyavāyas, tathāpi tathā prathanīyam yathā tāsāṃ na
GK19gp12-22u:987: pratyavāyaḥ syād, āyatyām iṣṭāpattiḥ syād, akhilāyatyāṃ pūrna-tad-āpattiś
GK19gp12-22u:989: [27] tad evaṃ vimṛśan sa kila vilambam anavalambamānaḥ śrī-vrajam ājagāma
GK19gp12-22u:990: | āgamya ca nijam uṭaja-taṭaṃ sa-dhyānam adhyāsīnāṃ paurṇamāsīṃ prati
GK19gp12-22u:992: gatvā ca sarvam evedaṃ nivedya punar nivedayāmāsa, mayedaṃ tāvat kartavyam, bhavatyā tu tāsāṃ yathānyatra patyādi-vyavahāraḥ satyāya na kalpate, kintu loka-pratyāyana-mātrāya tathā vyavahartavyam iti |
GK19gp12-22u:993: [28] tad evaṃ tāṃ sambhāṣya śrīmad-vrajarāja-sambhāṣaṇaṃ nirvāhya,
GK19gp12-22u:995: te ca tam āgatam akasmān niśāmya
GK19gp12-22u:997: praṇāmādibhiḥ paripūjya kuśalam anuyujya pracchannatayā tam evārthaṃ
GK19gp12-22u:998: papracchuḥ, idaṃ tāvac chaṅkitaṃ; tatra kiṃ kartavyam? iti |
GK19gp12-22u:999: [29] sa tūvāca-vayam idaṃ sarvam apūrvaṃ pūrvam api jānīmahe |
GK19gp12-22u:1000: idaṃ ca bhavadbhiḥ sambaddhyam adhyavasitam, kintv ekā śaṅkā śaṅkur iva maṅkṣu
GK19gp12-22u:1003: vraja-rājāṅgaja-vara-kumāreṇa saha saṅgamaḥ syāt, tadā nātivilamabataḥ sarvasyāpi vrajasya tadīya-cira-vipralambha-lambhanaṃ bhavitā, kim
GK19gp12-22u:1004: utāmūṣām? kiṃ ca, prauḍhatām ūḍhavatīnāṃ tu
GK19gp12-22u:1006: pi tasmād vinivartanaṃ kartuṃ samarthaḥ syād ity api kadarthanāntaraṃ bhaviṣyati |
GK19gp12-22u:1007: tasmān nanda-kulāvataṃsāt kaṃsāc ca vañcayituṃ cañcalam evānyebhyaḥ sampradātavyā navyāḥ kanyakāḥ
GK19gp12-22u:1008: [30] tad evam ādiśya prasthite yadu-purohite tat-kṛtopadeśopajātādaro
GK19gp12-22u:1009: nija-nija-kanyā-gopana-paro gopa-nikaro' pi tāsāṃ sampradānāya sampradānam anveṣṭuṃ suṣṭhu cintām avāpa, kintu santatam asya sā lālasā tu nālasā jātā |
GK19gp12-22u:1010: [31] tad evam etāsāṃ sva-tanayena pariṇayanaṃ prati vrajapati-jampatī ca pūrvam atīva tīvra-spṛhā-gṛhīta-cittāv āstām |
GK19gp12-22u:1013: kintu gargeṇa tadvad eva nirastāv ity
GK19gp12-22u:1015: [32] anutāpas tu tayor nāpajagāma, tad-bhrātṛ-paryāyāś ca tad ekānugati-maryādayā paryākulās tāsāṃ kanyānām sva-putrāya nyāsam anyāyaṃ manyamānās tataḥ parāṅ-mukhā babhūvuḥ |
GK19gp12-22u:1016: kiṃ bahunā? sarva eva kevala-snehatas tatra kṛṣṇa-varatāyām eva jātehatāṃ saṃhitavantaḥ
GK19gp12-22u:1026: [34] putrān apy atikramya tatra sthitānāṃ kṛṣṇa eva hi sukhasatrāyate |
GK19gp12-22u:1027: [35] tad evaṃ jñāta-rahasyo' pi nirṇīta-nīti-praṇītaye rahasi vraja-rājam
GK19gp12-22u:1028: upavrajya sa ca tat-pitṛ-vargaḥ pratisvam eva tam artham arthayāmāsa, [36]
GK19gp12-22u:1029: āmuṣyakulikā kalitā dhanyāḥ khalu tāḥ kanyāḥ kṛṣṇanyāsata eva sa-nyāyatām
GK19gp12-22u:1031: sa yadi bhavadbhiḥ svayam aṅgīkriyate, tadā bhaṅgībhiḥ prasaṅgam
GK19gp12-22u:1033: [37] vrajarājas tu tad ākarṇyam ākarṇya sa-niśvāsam idaṃ vivarṇatayā varṇitavān, asmābhiḥ sva-putrāya sarvathā na te sambandhāḥ sandhātavyāḥ,
GK19gp12-22u:1035: yat khalu yuṣmākam apatyāni yuṣmākam ivāsmākaṃ sneha-sātatya-vahāni samudvāhayitavyāni ca, tasmād asmābhir eva
GK19gp12-22u:1037: [38] tad evaṃ sthagita-samullāse nikhile ca vrajāvāse
GK19gp12-22u:1038: vrajapaty-anumaty-anusāratas tāsāṃ pitaras tad-vitaram ācarituṃ ruciṃ vināpi bahir udyamam ācaritavantaḥ |
GK19gp12-22u:1040: atibālya-caryā-paryākulatayā na kiñcid api cid-amatratāṃ ninyire |
GK19gp12-22u:1041: [40] atha yā kācid vṛndāvana-gahvarataḥ sākṣāt kila yogamāyāyā vyājatas tāpasyās tatra cāhvayataḥ paurṇamāsyāḥ samabhyarṇaṃ ahar-divaṃ prāyaḥ kimapi mantrāyituṃ āgantrī dṛśyate; yā ca mānuṣy api devīyamāneti vā devy api mānuṣīyamāṇeti vā lakṣayituṃ na śakyate kintu sad-ānukūlatayā
GK19gp12-22u:1043: yasyām anumīyate, sā vṛndāriketi nijākhyāṃ prakhyāpayanty api jana-vṛndena
GK19gp12-22u:1047: [41] abhyāgatām atha tāṃ japārtham āsīnāpi, paurṇamāsī tūrṇam upavrajya
GK19gp12-22u:1048: namaskurvatīṃ pariṣvajya śubhāśiṣā ca saṃyujya svacchamanāḥ papracchuḥ,
GK19gp12-22u:1049: kathyatāṃ katham asamayam idaṃ tava samāgamanam? iti |
GK19gp12-22u:1050: [42] vṛndāha-bhagavati, param āpadāṃ padam ekam utpannam asti, kathaṃ tava niścintatā dṛśyate?
GK19gp12-22u:1052: [44] vṛndāha-hanta, yāḥ khalu nityatayā kṛṣṇasya preyasya iti śrūyante,
GK19gp12-22u:1053: tāsām apy anya-sambandhaḥ sanirbandha iva dṛśyate |
GK19gp12-22u:1056: [47] paurṇamāsī uvāca-na bhaviṣyati tāsām anyenānyena saṃyoga-sambandhaḥ,
GK19gp12-22u:1057: yato mayā hi māyayā parā nirmāya nirmāsyate tatra pratibandhaḥ |
GK19gp12-22u:1059: [49] paurṇamāsī uvāca-na syād api tasyāpi sthitiḥ, yato munayaḥ punar idaṃ
GK19gp12-22u:1061: nāsūyan khalu kṛṣṇāya mohitās tasya māyayā |
GK19gp12-22u:1064: [50] ataeva putrotpatty-abhāvāt pāyayantyaḥ śiśūn payaḥ ity atra śiśūn ity eva payaḥ ity eva ca vakṣyanti, na tu sutān stanam iti |
GK19gp12-22u:1065: etad apekṣayaiva kvacit putratva-vyapadeśaś ca śrī-kṛṣṇa-parihāsa-nirdeśaś ca saṅgaṃsyate
GK19gp12-22u:1066: [51] vṛndāha-yady evaṃ tarhy anyena tāsāṃ pāṇipīḍanaṃ punar atīva pīḍanam |
GK19gp12-22u:1067: yatra prāyaścittāntaram api na cintayanti tantra-vidaḥ, tat kathaṃ sāmprataṃ sva-vratam
GK19gp12-22u:1068: [52] paurṇamāsī sasmitam uvāca-bhāviny, etad api na bhāvi, tvayā tu ramyānanatayā gamyatām
GK19gp12-22u:1069: [53] vṛndā sānandaṃ padāravindayoḥ patantī sānumodaṃ ruroda |
GK19gp12-22u:1070: sā tu tāṃ niravahittham utthāpya sāntvayitvā gahanāya prasthāpayāmāsa |
GK19gp12-22u:1071: [54] atha vṛndāpi tathā viśvasatī niśvasatī ca vitrāsa-rahitā
GK19gp12-22u:1074: vivarṇa-vadanā paurṇamāsy-abhyarṇaṃ punar api tūrṇam upasthānā
GK19gp12-22u:1076: [55] paurṇamāsī uvāca-kim iva vṛttaṃ vṛttam yasmād bhavaty udvṛtta-cittā
GK19gp12-22u:1078: [56] vṛndāha-mama mukhataḥ kācid apy uktir na vyaktībhavati, kim iva vaktavyam?
GK19gp12-22u:1079: [57] paurṇamāsī uvāca-paṅkajākṣi, na kācid api śaṅkā manasi śaṅkanīyā |
GK19gp12-22u:1081: [59] paurṇamāsī uvāca-yad adyāpy asiddha-nirvāha eva tāsāṃ vivāhaḥ |
GK19gp12-22u:1082: [60] vṛndāha-vicakṣaṇe, tam etaṃ cākṣuṣam eva vidhāya sarve' py ācakṣate |
GK19gp12-22u:1084: [62] vṛndāha-tad idam api śrutam, yad atibālakatayāvagatāḥ pitṛ-geha eva tā nidhāya te gatā iti |
GK19gp12-22u:1085: [63] paurṇamāsī sa-praṇaya-roṣam uvāca-atha kathaṃ mat-kathanaṃ na pratyeṣi yat kiṃvadantīm eva muhur vadantī vartase?
